=======
History
=======

0.2 (2016-Feb-13)
-----------------
* add some infos
* output sorted to improve readibility
* add ability to filter sections (?s=os,python)
* add CACHES infos
* removed command line utility


0.1.1 (2016-01-20)
------------------
* improved coverage
* fixes typos in copyright


0.1.0 (2016-01-15)
------------------
* First release on PyPI.
